Title: Lion's Landing
Description:
For too long the Horde has been allowed to run rampant across Azeroth. I will not see these new lands conquered by some barbaric "warchief."

Are you ready to bring Alliance justice to the shores of Pandaria?

Let us return to the landing site. Use the flare launcher to bring in the fleet proper, and begin Operation: Shieldwall.
ObjectivesText: Use the Flare Launcher in Krasarang Cove to signal the Alliance fleet.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Use the Flare Launcher in Krasarang Cove to signal the Alliance fleet.
RewardText: <Blue sails are barely visible on the horizon - the full might of the Alliance fleet, awaiting one final signal.>
